bioconda.name: bioconductor-traser
bioconda.summary: GWAS trait-associated SNP enrichment analyses in genomic intervals

biotools.summary: Performs GWAS trait-associated SNP enrichment analyses in genomic intervals using different hypothesis testing approaches, also provides various functionalities to explore and visualize the results.

bioschemas.name: traseR
bioschemas.summary: Performs GWAS trait-associated SNP enrichment analyses in genomic intervals using different hypothesis testing approaches, also provides various functionalities to explore and visualize the results.
